Package it.unicam.cs.formula1.Movement

Interface Movement

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMovement
public interface Movement
Defines the movement strategies for a bot. Provides methods to accelerate, decelerate, and calculate the main point for movement.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Position
    accelerate(Position actualPosition, Position previousMove)
    Accelerates the movement from the main point based on the previous move.
    Position
    calculateMainPoint(Position actualPosition, Position previousMove)
    Calculates the main point for movement based on the actual position and the previous move.
    Position
    decelerate(Position actualPosition, Position previousMove)
    Decelerates the movement from the main point based on the previous move.
    void
    decreaseSpeed()
    Decrease the speed
    void
    increaseSpeed()
    Increase the speed

  • Method Details

    • accelerate

      Position accelerate(Position actualPosition, Position previousMove)
      Accelerates the movement from the main point based on the previous move.
      Parameters:
      actualPosition - the actual position of the bot
      previousMove - the previous move made
      Returns:
      the new position after acceleration

    • decelerate

      Position decelerate(Position actualPosition, Position previousMove)
      Decelerates the movement from the main point based on the previous move.
      Parameters:
      actualPosition - the actual position of the bot
      previousMove - the previous move made
      Returns:
      the new position after deceleration

    • calculateMainPoint

      Position calculateMainPoint(Position actualPosition, Position previousMove)
      Calculates the main point for movement based on the actual position and the previous move.
      Parameters:
      actualPosition - the actual position of the bot
      previousMove - the previous move made
      Returns:
      the new main point position
